name: Undergroove
description:
Undergroove, our submission for the Global Game Jam 2023! Original submission here  

  

Controls:
  • A / D >> Move
  • Space Bar >> Jump
  • Left Shift >> Stick to ground
  • Left Mouse >> "Grow" song
  • Right Mouse >> "Shrink" song
  • Esc >> Quit 

 

A game by:

Game Design:
Damiano Tagliaferri, Emanuele Luigi Andolfi, Maria Zanellato, Simone Bucarini

Development:
Antonio Troiano, Damiano Tagliaferri, Ismail Gazzeh, Luca Saladin Quartucci

Graphics:
Andrea Siviero, Christian Tagliapietra, Gianmarco Tora, Simone Piermattei, Valentina Budeanu

Music / SFX:
Andrea Ceccarelli, Emanuele Luigi Andolfi, Giacomo Tagliaventi

Level Design:
Simone Bucarini
